Subskills.name: Cannoningfodder
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by cannon turret.

Subskills.name: Cannon Turrets
Subskills.description: Increases the maximum amount of cannon turrets.

Subskills.name: Megacannon
Subskills.description: Now launches a giant bomb that covers a larger area but cannon turret attack speed is reduced.

Subskills.name: Cannonballs
Subskills.description: Chance when hitting the ground to unleash additional cannonballs on nearby targets.

Subskills.name: Stunning Blast
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to stun the target.

Subskills.name: Doom Ball
Subskills.description: Chance for cannon turrets to fire a huge cannonball with increased damage and size.

Subskills.name: Weakened Blast
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to stunned targets.

Subskills.name: Landing Spot
Subskills.description: Increases explosion area of effect radius of cannon turret.

Subskills.name: Weakening Blast
Subskills.description: Cannonballs cause monsters to take extra damage from all sources.

Subskills.name: Multishred
Subskills.description: Increases the amount of explosion shrapnel from cannon turret projectiles.

Subskills.name: Frostbitten Fodder
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to inflict deep freeze.

Subskills.name: Mid Air Crisis
Subskills.description: The bomb explodes into shrapnel mid-air that hits monsters below causing them to bleed based on your attack damage.

Subskills.name: Burst Artillery
Subskills.description: Fires multiple cannonballs in a quick succession.
